amendment.description: In the nature of a substitute.

action.text: Amendment SA 2095 proposed by Senator Hutchison to Amendment SA 2093.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2095, under the order of 4/26/2012, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 37 - 62. Record Vote Number: 86.
